articles.title: Umpire controversy explodes at World Cup
articles.description: South Africa survived a late charge from Pakistan to pull off a thrilling one-wicket win and move closer to the semi-finals of the Cricket World Cup.
articles.content:

articles.title: 'Lord's all over again!' - Rizwan and the stumping that wasn't
articles.description: Rizwan sends reminders of Jonny Bairstow's stumping at Lord's by running Markram out but not appealing during Pakistan's Cricket World Cup match against South Africa.
articles.content:

articles.title: What we learned from watching the 1992 World Cup final in full again | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.description: Wides, lbw calls, swing - plenty of things were different in white-ball cricket back then | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.content: Last week, we at ESPNcricinfo did something we have been thinking of doing for eight years now: pretend-live ball-by-ball commentary for a classic cricket match. We knew the result, yes, but we tried… [+6823 chars]
